fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: End of waste, packaging directive, animal by product regulation, fertilizer regulation; organic farming regulations, circular economy package
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
European Compost Network 
International Solid Waste Association 
World Biogas Association 
Mediterranean Compost Network
goals__remit: To promote the development of source separated collection of organic waste, for use in the production of compost and biomathane. To promote the use of high quality compost and digestate on field crops, nurseries, vegetable crops, landscaping and other uses. To promote the use of compostable packaging materials destined to composting and AD plants.
